name: df-gobi
body: |- wceq(cgob, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(co(cv(s0), cgoi, cv(s1)), cgoa, co(cv(s1), cgoi, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the Godel-set of equivalence. Here the arguments ` U ` and ` V ` are also Godel-sets corresponding to smaller formulas. Note that this is a _class_ expression, not a wff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
